text: Radka Bobková was the defending champion, but lost in first round to Petra Begerow. Irina Spîrlea won the title by defeating Brenda Schultz 6–4, 1–6, 7–6(7–5) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== ==External links== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Torneo Internazional Femmin di Palermo - Singles 1994 Singles
title: 1994 Torneo Internazional Femmin di Palermo – Singles
